headline.main: EIGHTH ARMY FIRM; General Asserts Enemy Has Not Penetrated Organized Area U.S. FLIERS ATTACK SHIPS American Fighter Pilots Aid British Bombers' Blows Along Battle Line HITS ROMMEL FROM AIR EIGHTH ARMY FIRM IN DESERT DEFENSE IMPERIAL FORCES HOLD DEFENSES IN DESERT

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Sept. 2 -- United States and other Allied planes and British guns heavily bombed and shelled Axis forces in the Western Desert today.
abstract: 8th Army comdr Lt Gen Montgomery on Brit stand
